content.question: The rate law for the reaction shown is <math alttext="rate equals, k times the molar concentration of N O, squared, times the molar concentration of H 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>r</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>t</mi><mi>e</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><mi>NO</mi><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo stretchy="false">[</mo><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">]</mo></math>.
